entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `runtime-coreclr jitstress-isas-x86` pipeline failing on OSX x64 #80403
  • Default IsDynamicCodeSupported feature switch to true for CoreCLR #80398
  • MacOS: Switch to PersistKeySet on X509Certificate2Collection.Import() causes failure on MacOS (Windows and Linux work fine) #80396
  • CoreCLR runtime seems to have a subtle bug in HFA flag calculation #80393
    8.0.0
  • Cloud Native: Improve Startup and workingset for Trimmed WebApp #80388
    8.0.0
  • Self-contained application not starting on ARM64 & Amazon Linux 2 #80404
  • Improve FrozenDictionary/Set code coverage #80378
    8.0.0
  • How to resolve IL2026? #80374
  • Design and implement robust testing story for single-file #80369
    8.0.0
  • Extract interface IReadOnlyStream in System.IO.Stream #80368
  • debugger step into conditional branch when portable pdb generated from cil manually and using line attribute #80367
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Ascii.ToUtf16 overload that treats `\0` as invalid #80366
  • Undue restrictions on adding types with System.Reflection.Metadata.Ecma335.MetadataBuilder #80360
  • Test failure JIT\\Directed\\LoopAlignment\\LoopsToProcess\\LoopsToProcess.cmd #80358
    8.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices/exceptions/simple/ParallelCrash/ParallelCrash.sh #80357
    8.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices/exceptions/simple/ParallelCrashMainThread/ParallelCrashMainThread.sh #80356
  • Xamarin.Android 支持 System.IO.Ports #80352

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] We should be able to hijack in funclets #72343
    Future
  • Aes-Gcm tags should support other sizes than 16 on macOS #80329
  • Crash when running a csc compiled program in mono VM #80342
  • Possible performance issue using Vector<Double> from stack allocated Span #80385
  • NET 7: Calling `GC.Collect()` causes Access Violation exception (cx0000005) #79486
    8.0.0
  • Add ability to disable reflection emit for testing #39806
    Future
  • .net462 httpClient does not seem to listen to cancellation token. #80370
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json source generator fails to deserialize init-only & required properties #58770
    8.0.0
  • FileInfo.Createtime seem to be wrong (.Net 6 on Linux) #80023
  • Analyzer Proposal: Recommend use of concrete types to maximize devirtualization potential #51193
    8.0.0
  • [UWP] Cryptography.ProtectedData version 7.0 => System.PlatformNotSupportedException #78875
    7.0.x
  • System.InvalidCastException: Arg_InvalidCastException after upgrading blazor webassembly from .net 6 to .net 7 #78864
  • HttpClient becomes very slow and cancel request after migrating to NET 7 #79443
  • Can't add typed HttpClient for BackgroundService #80303
  • Console.WriteLine() skips newline if line length matches default console width #80373
  • JIT output for various empty string test methods extremely suboptimal #63201
    Future
  • JIT: Invalid isSimdAsHWIntrinsic param passed in lclmorph #80239
    8.0.0
  • add SslStreamCertificateContext to SslClientAuthenticationOptions #71194
    8.0.0
  • [LSG] Objects logging using @ operator in logging source generator attribute #78013
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Build tools subset to generate artifacts #80406
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2083765 #80405
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement new `ComWrappers` APIs #80402
    area-Interop-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [workloads] Add Current to the name of the workload manifest #80401
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Revert "Reserve memory for FOH in-range" #80400
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Move a regression test out of CI #80399
  • Update Libraries Feature Switches for DynamicCodeSupport #80397
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, linkable-framework
  • Add tests for frozen collections #80395
    area-System.Collections
  • Remove check for assembly name in p/invoke library load #80394
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Backport to 7.0 of 80302 that fixes #79486 #80392
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-coreclr
  • Implement Startup hooks support in Mono #80391
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] Reverting wrong commit changing the helloworld sample #80390
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove Substrings from PhoneAttribute #80389
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations
  • Remove Substring from EventSource.InitializeProviderMetadata #80386
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Remove some string allocation from NormalizeServiceName #80384
  • Initial work to port EventPipe library to NativeAOT #80382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Rename some BinaryPrimitives files (and move some functions) #80381
  • Add ability statically link OpenSSL #80380
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add public RefSafetyRulesAttribute #80379
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use CompressionLevel.SmallestSize in Bundler #80372
    area-HostModel
  • Feature/logging messagetemplate compat #80364
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Expand bblocks reordering with common patterns to facilitate propagation of values #80362
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • Use ArgumentOutOfRangeException.ThrowIf helpers in more places #80355
    area-Meta
  • Change the default loop unroll limit to 4 #80353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • AOT: Handle printing names of generic parameter types #80371
  • [release/7.0] Fix pGeneratedNewStub determination #80269
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.3
  • Add a debug only config knob to control the maximum force inline depth #80349
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix HFA detection in Crossgen2 #80218
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Updated type of heap_segment_survived from int to size_t to facilitate survival >= 2GB. #80302
    area-GC-coreclr
  • remove draft UUID section superseded by RFC 4122 #80377
    area-Setup
  • Add IsDynamicCodeSupported Feature Switch #80246
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Add sourcegen support for required & init-only properties. #79828
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • perfcollect docs: run two commands instead of three #76325
    documentation, area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Report more accurately when loop unrolling changes the IR #80310
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • retrieve method symbol only once in logging source gen parser #80365
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix SignedCms certificate collection modification with attribute certificates #80188
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 7.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Fix SignedCms certificate collection modification with attribute certificates #80209
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 6.0.14
  • [release/6.0][Android] Fix SslStream on legacy Android API levels #79277
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 6.0.14
  • Add more specialized frozen collection types. #79794
    area-System.Collections
  • initial support for '@' symbol in message template #79038
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Use PackedIndexOfIsSupported checks in more places #80254
  • JIT: Fall back to a canonical SIMD handle in gtGetStructHandleForSimdOrHW #80240
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix purity of CORINFO_HELP_GETREFANY on win-x64 #80292
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add SslClientAuthenticationOptions.ClientCertificateContext #80182
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2082819 #80322
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Create analyzer in ComInterfaceGenerator to enforce the generator is used with IUnknown only #78189
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Change github illink links #80407
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix a few profiler related issues associated with frozen objects #79563
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Don't use IlcPath in NativeAOT targets #79233
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add a bitset with IL jump targets #80136
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • WIP - NativeAOT for FreeBSD #80323
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Report FOH segments #79985
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [wasm] Move microbenchmarks, and blazor SOD runs to net8.0 #80308
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Remove RequiresDynamicCode from Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #79425
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [release/7.0] [browser] make dynamic import cancelable #80312
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • measure the perf impact of deduplicating IsCompleted call in GetConsumingEnumerable #78887
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • delete enum support for bool as an underlying type #79962
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • Add support for JsonUnmappedMemberHandling #79945
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Prefix exported symbols defined via EntryPoint of UnmanagedCallersOnl… #79880
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Bundle assemblies as WebCIL #79416
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • fuse < and > with = when applicable #78786
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Restore Advance when reading float/double with XmlBufferReader. #80321
    Servicing-consider, area-Serialization, 7.0.x
  • Cache allregs to avoid checking the type repeatedly #76850
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAOT: avoid helper calls for static fields #79709
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification in SslStream #77386
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] optimize out 'is this method MulticastDelegate.Invoke' checks in aot->interp transitions #80181
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Refactoring store liveness update #79724
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Consistently use fgMakeMultiUse in the gtNewSimd*Node APIs #80242
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Emit mneg for mul+neg on Arm64 #79550
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Honor virtual memory limit #80295
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Add a pass of early liveness and use it for forward sub and last-use copy elision for implicit byrefs #79346
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] Cloning files on OSX-like platforms when possible instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Removing console.debug message helper to make debugger work. #72812
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • [draft][wasm] Memory snapshot #78915
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Reduce allocations in `BinaryReader`. #80331
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger][libs] Documentation: How to debug library tests #77368
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fixed array delete in debugger.cpp #79638
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix parsing the output of `ping` on Samsung phones #80133
    area-System.Net
  • Handle Assert failure when GetDelegateForFunctionPointer is invoked with VoidDelegate type #79530
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix crash when GetDelegateForFunctionPointer is passed non delegate type #79744
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Handle crash when [out] parameter of type Intptr* is passed to delegate #79763
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reduce the number of forced `MethodTable`s #79594
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make WriteCommentValue() overloads have same behavior; Make the Utf8JsonWriter always insert newlines between the end of comments and the start of arrays or objects #75074
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Equalize committed space in free regions and move regions to global free list #77597
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [EXPERIMENTAL - will be reverted] Opt-in for msbuild server in CI #79444
  • Enforce HttpClient limits on GetFromJsonAsync #79386
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup intrinsinsics + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C exception propagation #80334
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove System.Security.Permissions from S.C.CM. #80347
    area-System.Configuration, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix most violations of new CA1859 #80335
    area-Meta
